pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Tile Maps // Implements an algorithm for generating maps, known as tile maps, in which each region is represented by a single tile of the same shape and size. The algorithm was first proposed in "Generating Tile Maps" by Graham McNeill and Scott Hale (2017) doi:10.1111/cgf.13200. Functions allow users to generate, plot, and compare square or hexagon tile maps.
